entries.meaning: (fantasy) A fictional small humanoid creature featuring in fantasy fiction; a hobbit.
(fantasy) A fictional humanoid born of a human parent and a parent of another race in fantasy fiction.
A half-grown person, between a child and an adult.
examples: Often it had been my fate to accompany the pick of the knight errantry of Whinnyliggate on such quests—for, though Nance was about my own age, she had become a reigning belle while I was but a halfling boy.
